info.name: Telegram Web with cat background
info.description: Add Telegram default cat background to the main box of Telegram Web. Subtle gradients and smooth shadows are also included.
info.additionalInfo: v1.1.1 Update the transparent mic icon again (tested on v0.7.0) v1.1 Update corresponding to Telegram Web v0.5.7: add some transparent background to the microphone button, whose opaque background is too disturbing. v1.0 Initial release
